title: mccl启动器启动不了
author: 时光未桀
txt_content:
这是报错
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Don't do that.

Time: 20-4-23 下午7:20
Description: Initializing game

org.lwjgl.LWJGLException: Pixel format not accelerated
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.nChoosePixelFormat(Native Method)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.choosePixelFormat(WindowsPeerInfo.java:52)

        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:757)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:739)

        at bcx.an(SourceFile:434)
        at bcx.a(SourceFile:381)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:124)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- Head --
Thread: Client thread
Stacktrace:

-- Initialization --
Details:
Stacktrace:

-- System Details --

replies.author: HolographicHat
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 HolographicHat 于 2020-4-23 19:39 编辑 

试试升级显卡驱动？
如果显卡驱动是最新版本，那么说明你的显卡不支持在win10上运行minecraft，尝试回退操作系统或更换显卡或换一台电脑

replies.author: 时光未桀
replies.txt_content: 鲁大师上说都不用升啊

replies.author: 时光未桀
replies.txt_content: 谢谢谢谢谢谢谢谢谢谢谢谢谢谢谢谢
